code: @Test public void testMinaSpringEndpoint() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint result = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     result.expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("myMinaEndpoint", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     // checking the endpoint uri     Mina2Endpoint endpoint = applicationContext.getBean("myMinaEndpoint", Mina2Endpoint.class).     Integer port = applicationContext.getBean("port", Integer.class).     assertEquals("mina2:tcp:localhost:" + port, endpoint.getEndpointUri()). }
